fields.name: Arcane Amber
fields.description: Arcane Amber is a modern take on a classic style, boasting caramel and biscuit malt flavours with a subtle hop bitterness, creating a balanced and approachable ale with a hint of mystery.

fields.name: Celestial Citra
fields.description: Celestial Citra is a modern IPA showcasing the vibrant Citra hop, bursting with citrus, tropical fruit, and floral aromas and flavours, balanced by a clean malt backbone and a smooth, bitter finish.

fields.name: Dark Enchantment
fields.description: Dark Enchantment is a limited edition milk stout brewed with chocolate malt and cocoa nibs, creating a rich and indulgent beer with flavours of dark chocolate, roasted coffee, and a creamy, sweet finish.

fields.name: Druid's Delight
fields.description: Druid's Delight is an American amber ale with a rich malt backbone and a subtle hop bitterness, delivering flavours of caramel, toasted bread, and a hint of citrus, creating a delightful potion for any occasion.

fields.name: Enigma Elixir
fields.description: Enigma Elixir is a hazy IPA brewed with oats and wheat for a soft mouthfeel and dry-hopped with Enigma hops, imparting flavours of tropical fruit, citrus, and stone fruit, creating a magical elixir of flavour.

fields.name: Magus Maple
fields.description: Magus Maple is a bewitching ale brewed with rich, caramelised maple syrup, offering flavours of toasted nuts, toffee, and a hint of maple sweetness, creating a comforting elixir perfect for autumn nights.

fields.name: Midnight Porter
fields.description: Midnight Porter is a limited edition brew with roasted malt flavours reminiscent of dark chocolate and coffee, balanced with a subtle sweetness and a smooth, velvety finish, perfect for unraveling the mysteries of the night.

fields.name: Mystic Malt
fields.description: Mystic Malt is a classic English-style pale ale brewed with traditional English hops and malt, offering biscuity malt flavours with earthy and floral hop notes, resulting in a balanced and flavourful ale.

fields.name: Potion Pale
fields.description: Potion Pale is a light and refreshing session pale ale bursting with tropical fruit aromas and flavours from a blend of Citra and Amarillo hops, making it the perfect potion for easy-drinking enchantment.

fields.name: Sorcerer's Stout
fields.description: Sorcerer's Stout is a bold and robust imperial stout brewed with roasted barley, chocolate malt, and a touch of lactose, resulting in rich flavours of dark chocolate, espresso, and a hint of sweetness.

fields.name: Sorcery Sour
fields.description: Sorcery Sour is a limited edition sour ale brewed with tart cherries, creating a bright and refreshing beer with a puckering acidity and fruity sweetness, perfect for enchanting the taste buds.

fields.name: Spellbound Session
fields.description: Spellbound Session is a low-alcohol IPA bursting with juicy hop flavours of mango, papaya, and pine, balanced with a light malt backbone, providing a refreshing and bewitching experience.
